PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The higher FF for the POBDTPD device was ascribed to a good balance between the hole and electron mobilities.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| FF | Full Form (FF) |
| hole | noun (hole) |
| electron | noun (electron) |
| mobility | noun (mobility) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| FF | Full Form (FF) |
| mobility | noun (mobility) |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to material properties:

* "step" (which is a verb)
* "think" (which is a verb)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
